original_text: And they that passed by railed on him, wagging their heads, and saying, Ah, thou that destroyest the temple, and buildest it in three days,
korean_text: 지나가는 자들은 자기 머리를 흔들며 예수를 모욕하여 이르되 아하 성전을 헐고 사흘에 짓는다는 자여

sentences.original_text: And they that passed by railed on him
Ah, thou that destroyest the temple
and buildest it in three days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 삼 일 안에 그것을 짓는 너여
